columns.name: workload_id
columns.description: The ID assigned to the workload.

columns.name: helpful_resource_display_text
columns.description: The helpful resource text to be displayed.

columns.name: helpful_resource_url
columns.description: The helpful resource URL for a question.

columns.name: improvement_plan_url
columns.description: The improvement plan URL for a question. This value is only available if the question has been answered.

columns.name: is_applicable
columns.description: Defines whether this question is applicable to a lens review.

columns.name: lens_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the lens.

columns.name: notes
columns.description: The notes associated with the workload.

columns.name: pillar_id
columns.description: The ID used to identify a pillar, for example, security. A pillar is identified by its PillarReviewSummary$PillarId.

columns.name: reason
columns.description: The reason why the question is not applicable to your workload.

columns.name: risk
columns.description: The risk for a given workload, lens review, pillar, or question.

columns.name: choice_answers
columns.description: A list of selected choices to a question in your workload.

columns.name: choices
columns.description: List of choices available for a question.

columns.name: selected_choices
columns.description: List of selected choice IDs in a question answer. The values entered replace the previously selected choices.
